PAYMENT_MULTIPLE - Static variable in class core.Bank
Per the machine project specifications, a loan payment is charged with $5000 interest; therefore, every payment totals to $25000.

PlayerRandom - Interface in core
Interface representing a game component that requires interaction from the player in generating a random number while the game itself is in motion (for example, the player has to spin a wheel to obtain a random number upon drawing some specific blue cards)
PlayerRandSpinController - Class in controllers
Class providing the controller for the processes related to spinning the wheel in order to dictate the amount received by a player on specific spaces or when a specific blue card is drawn
PlayerRandSpinController(SpinWheel, MainScreen, MainGameController, GameMaster) - Constructor for class controllers.PlayerRandSpinController
Creates a controller object with the graphical user interface related to spinning the wheel and the main screen, as well as the controller for the main gameplay and the central class providing all the methods necessary to play the game as parameters
